data.name: Dashwalk Dueling
data.detailed_description:
Dance your sword across the arena while trying to keep your feet on the ground in this fast-paced platform fighter. Choose from 8 supers & reversals to dismantle the competition.

Stable Online is Priority

To ensure stable & enjoyable online play, rollback netcode is planned on release & is currently in development.



Intense grounded movement is the foundation of Dashwalk Dueling's design. While on stage, movement is limited to only grounded options. Returning to stage is the only time jumping is available—otherwise, there is no jump. This encourages spacing heavy grounded play with any airtime being a struggle for your stock.



Combo Trials give players a place to master the game's combo system. Each fighter has their own set of trials, as well as extra sets of trials—Parry Trials, Universal option trials, & even a custom trials mode for players to create & share their own trials.



Guarding & parrying are designed for fast-paced play, even for defensive players. Parry is designed to complement the movement system; parrying can be done while aerial. Guarding is done by crouching, & works to "crouch cancel" your hitstun & let you punish your opponent with an aerial move or an improved version of the aerial parry.



Our combo system introduces crumple & crumple break to give the play access to expressive combos when landing a strong combo starter. Super canceling gives a massive frame advantage & pairs fantastically with crumple mechanics. Players darken when in hitstun to help you to understand combos intuitively, alongside a combo counter that will give you clear feedback on your combos and strings.



Training mode is built with labbing & competitive play in mind. Features like savestates, recording, frame advantage, move frame data, hitbox displays, per frame simulation, an adaptive combo counter, & more are included and togglable.


https://discord.gg/KdW9y9j3Mv

Thanks to Daniel Linssen
The most predominantly used pixelated fonts used in-game and elsewhere (3x6 and 5x7) were sourced from Daniel Linssen (@managore)

data.short_description: A super-technical minimalist platform fighter—explore expressive combo routes, fast-paced combat, and intricate grounded movement. With no health or damage, only you can convert a stray hit into a finishing blow!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.4 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Direct Input compatible controller
